song.title: Till Sofia
song.info:
#bermuda triangle# presents a tune to the very nicest person Minthy! made especially for her :)
greets to all the peo- ple giving their best friendship to this wonderful person :))
notice: the refrain is an almost total ripoff of Erasure. The smp- set was taken directly from the tune: "She Came To Me"
Pleez, don't spread this tune! :)
2/10 '99 - Sofia 15r!
1999 Bermuda Triangle
-----
Elrinth wrote: "amazing song by elfan and some more"
